abstract: Violence erupts in Mexican state of Jalisco as federal forces attempt to crack down on major drug gang; banks and gas stations are set on fire and military helicopter is shot down, killing 3 soldiers and injuring several others.
lead_paragraph: It was a rare fatal attack on a military aircraft during an outbreak of violence in Jalisco State that left banks and gas stations ablaze.

headline.main: Mexican Helicopter Shot Down, Killing 3 Soldiers
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | The Americas; Mexico: Army Copter Shot Down

snippet: It was a rare fatal attack on a military aircraft during an outbreak of violence in Jalisco State that left banks and gas stations ablaze.
